phrases: Laboratory is an organization that is developing a program
to rehabilitate people who have dropped out of society: your so-called NEETs.
For a year starting this spring,
we want you to be a student,
and go back to high school!
I have come too far to turn back!
I will do this ReLIFE thing!
I cannot handle waking up this early.
Oga-kun for the boys, and Hishiro-san for the girls.
Great to be working with you all!
I look forward to working with you all.
With these two leading you, I hope you have a fun first term.
But this year, she is in the same class as Hishiro-san, the top scorer in our grade.
So she is all fired up now and could not call in sick.
Oh, she must be mad she did not top the class.
Drop by the staff room later to pick up your silver pins.
Why are you rubbing salt into her wound?
But, well, you did have a cold.
Hope you can take her on at full strength next time.
It was all my fault, including my failure to take care of myself.
I do not want to use the cold as an excuse.
I just was not as good as her.
Yeah, yeah, I am not cute!
I bet you are glad you do not have to work with me anymore!
What is with the persecution complex?
I was trying to cheer you up!
As always, if you failed even one, you are going to take make-ups.
And you will keep taking them until you score higher than 50.
Study hard so you pass the first time.
F-Fifty or more on all of them?!
Wow, people like that actually exist?
By the way, which was the worst?
Well, excuse me for getting a four!
Not everyone is as smart as you!
It is the effort that counts.
Same to the rest of you.
I could tutor you, if you like.
Sorry if I am being too nosy,
but with those scores, who knows when you will escape the make-up loop?
I-I am not sure if I should feel insulted or not!
Could I get in on that?
What should I do at times like these?
I would be glad not to eat alone, but...
At this age, a boy and a girl eating together...
Will not people make fun of her?
We can get started on our test prep planning!
I am going to swing by the staff room for the silver pin.
You know where the cafeteria is?
What the heck is a silver pin?
Uh, I think it is... the symbol of the class rep.
Say, you and Kariu-san seem awfully close.
She came right out and asked him.
I was actually wondering the same thing.
And here I thought I read people better.
If she is not your girlfriend, what is with the matching earrings?
My brother insisted on piercing my ear.
It hurt so much, I did not let him do the other ear.
So the other half of this pair is going to go unused.
Are you seriously trying to fob it off on me because you do not like it?
Are you giving it to me or not?
And she came in the very next day with her ear pierced!
Anyway, that is all there is to it.
If you asked her if we were dating, Kariu would go berserk!
but he is the furthest thing from an exemplary high school boy, huh?
Total waste of a handsome face.
You should read more modern lit.
Focus your studies on comprehending the emotions of the characters.
Why am I being assigned homework?
Cannot we please work it out?
What happened to prepping for the make-ups?
Oh, it is the other class rep.
I will go to the staff room and be right back.
It is the guy who got a four.
I did not bring any money out of habit.
I said to wait while I got the silver pin,
Students with silver pins are to state their name and class every time.
And please wait in line like the others.
but they would already made the ramen, so...
Basically, you forgot your money and cannot buy lunch?
I just did not bring any.
Most things here do not cost more than 300 yen.
And I think 1,000 yen is a pretty large sum for a high schooler.
How can you lend me that much money so casually?
I just happen to have extra today!
It was an impulse, but I just took a high school girl's hand!
Then I will take you up on your kind offer.
I will pay you back tomorrow.
What am I getting worked up about?
Though you are not at all book smart.
She forgot her lunch money, so I loaned her some.
Last year's best student is a bit of a ditz, huh?
Nah, it is probably just because she does not have her silver pin yet.
When you have got this, you can eat here for free.
We also get commute allowance, tuition exemption, and all sorts of perks.
But we will never even get a sniff of all that.
Kariu was trying for the silver pin
Feel free to call me Kazu-kun
Got To keep'them off or on vibrate in class, though.
In my day, if you brought one in, they would take it for a month!
They do not even yell at you now?!
You should call me An, too.
You just dropped the honorific like it was nothing!
You are surprisingly good with girls.
You are just weirdly naive, Oga-kun.
I wrote something, but is it good enough?
I have written plenty of these for work, but...
Seriously, do not remember me like that!
I could not recall your name.
Um, why do you know my name?
I think you used it at lunch, too.
and you were introduced in this morning's homeroom, too.
Do not say everything you think!
I will not say it anymore, even if that is what I think.
By the way, what were you doing in the staff room?
Oh, did you get in trouble, too?
I came to pick up my silver pin.
Also, there was something I did not understand on the tests,
Am I a serious, boring girl?
I heard you topped the grade last year, so I just thought, No wonder.
No, I should be the one apologizing.
B-By the way, why do you speak so formally to me?
Do you think I am a delinquent or scary or something?
I sure hope that is the case,
because it feels like she thinks I am older, and that is giving me heart attacks.
She said as much at lunch.
This is how I talk to everyone.
People tell me that a lot.
Even at this age, I do not have any close friends.
I never thought that was a problem,
I keep thinking I need to change,
but I have no idea where to begin.
It would help if you could tell me honestly.
But I also feel like you would be worth getting to know.
I do not know, maybe try smiling a little more?
S-Sorry, it just was not what I was expecting.
You will make enemies, not friends!
If I cannot even manage a polite smile,
I will be in trouble in the real world.
Well, you do not have to rush things.
You will make friends in time, I am sure.
Did I put my foot in it?
Oh, but I am the same.
The future I assumed I would have
Of course I would rush things.
This year is my last chance.
I-I am not sure how to respond to this sudden attempt to mug me.
I want to know your phone number.
I am saying I want to be your friend.
I am trying to take the first step toward not being a friendless loner.
Sorry for not guessing all that.
But when you put it that clearly,
it will not be misunderstood, and I doubt anyone would turn you down.
Do not treat me like an idiot, idiot.
Would you drop the insults about my intelligence already?!
You also seem like someone worth getting to know.
For better or worse, she is an utterly straightforward girl.
You smiled when I loaned you that 1,000 yen, too.
Ah, but do not try and force it!
It is especially easy to get hooked at your age!
You will not be able to quit!
Well, only your exterior looks young,
so that is not a problem.
But you will probably find it hard to buy them with your appearance.
May be a good time to quit!
Hard to shake the smell, after all.
You just got Hishiro-san to smile.
Cannot have her turning against you!
I was in the same class with her last year,
and she was alone the whole time.
But, like I told you from the start,
after your one-year ReLIFE period is over,
classmates, teachers, and anyone you dealt with will forget about you.
This is because 17-year-old Kaizaki does not exist.
But your own memories will remain, so do not worry.
If we erased those, there would be no point to the ReLIFE.
If I tell anyone else about ReLIFE,
And you will wipe my memories and throw me out?
If you do, you will find yourself wondering
how you got to be twenty-eight without remembering it.
Hishiro Chizuru New message Close View
Thank you very much for today.
I promise to return the 1,000 yen tomorrow.
I look forward to knowing you further.
Thanks for adding me on LIME.
By the way, this sticker of the sorry cat...
It kind of looks like you.
Uh oh, she is going to get mad at me for saying dumb crap again.
I did not mean it in a bad way!
I do not know if she will get that...
I did not see that coming!
I only eat tonkotsu ramen at the cafeteria.
I ran into some trouble due to not having my silver pin.
